sourcesContent:
import { useContext } from "react" import { ShopContext } from "../Context/ShopContext" export const Values = ( { CEP, cupom } ) =>{ const cep = CEP() const cupomDeDesconto = cupom //console.log(cep) console.log(cupomDeDesconto) const { priceProducts } = useContext(ShopContext) let percentual = 0.10; let desconto = priceProducts * percentual; let novoPreco = priceProducts - desconto; return(

Resumo do Pedido

Subtotal

R$: {priceProducts}

Entrega

R$: {priceProducts}

Cupom de desconto

R$: {cupomDeDesconto > 0 ? ( novoPreco ) : ( priceProducts )}

Total

R$: {priceProducts}

R$: {priceProducts}

R$: {novoPreco}

Valor com 10% de desconto no Boleto ou PIX

) }
